resources.string: For production and development, we need funding, one of which comes from advertisment revenue
1. To remove ads, you can support us by purchasing the premium version or the ad-removed version.
2. Contact us by email to be considered for participation in the pilot program, from which you can use versions with less ads but may not be optimized for performance.
What Ads type do we use?
We are associated with many ad network partners and the largest is Google Ad for major ad formats
- Full screen ads interspersed between screens
- Banner, native ads are customized as a component of AD (usually with a yellow label)
We are always trying to balance the user experience and advertisement
